title: D00M ]|[
body: In case you've been living under a rock, or if you just don't care,  <a href="http://www.theinquirer.net/?article=15860">Doom</a> <a href="http://www.warcry.com/scripts/columns/view_sectionalt.phtml?site=15&id=108&colid=2947">3</a> <a href="http://pc.gamespy.com/pc/doom-3/513374p1.html?fromint=1">is</a> <a href="http://www.reuters.com/newsArticle.jhtml?type=technologyNews&storyID=5109068">set</a> <a href="http://www.ferrago.com/story/3558">to</a> <a href="http://www.gamespot.com/pc/action/doom3/news_6097046.html">launch</a> <a href="http://ve3d.ign.com/articles/513/513458p1.html">this</a> <a href="http://games.slashdot.org/games/04/05/11/1439257.shtml?tid=127&tid=186&tid=206">summer</a>.  <a href="http://travis.servebeer.com/amazon.net/Video+Games/PC/Doom+3+(III)/B00006C2HA/amazon.trav">Doom 3</a> has been on my damn wishlist since October of 2002 (it was only $35 back then, now it's up to $50).  Hopefully I'm not going to get let down by more delays.  Needless to say, I can't wait.
bodyArticleHtml:
